title: Pets Welcome! We accept indoor cats and dogs! Ask for details!
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 720 sq ft | $1364/Month', 'Woodland Trace', '1669 Iris Drive SE', 'Conyers, GA 30013', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Experience apartment living done right at Woodland Trace, our thoughtfully designed and beautifully maintained community of apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.', 'At Woodland Trace, residents enjoy spacious floorplans brimming with natural light, modern gourmet kitchens, built-in breakfast bars, cozy fireplaces and private patios & balconies.', 'Plus, our gorgeous Conyers, Georgia apartments feature extra touches like full size washer and dryer connections, new appliances, faux hardwood flooring, modern brushed-nickel lighting, custom paint and tons of closet and storage space to make your life as comfortable and convenient as can be.', 'Enjoy the ultimate living experience at Woodland Trace Apartments in Conyers, GA.', 'The Sierra', 'Apartment Amenities:', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Oven/Range', '❖ Spacious Closets', '❖ Storage Units', '❖ Tub/Shower', '❖ Views', '❖ Window Coverings', '❖ Air Conditioning and Heating', '❖ Fireplaces in Select Units', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Individual Climate Control', '❖ Newly Renovated with Black Appliances', '❖ Patios or Balconies in Select Units', '❖ Refrigerator/Freezer', '❖ Upgraded Flooring in Select Units', '❖ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '❖ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '❖ Barbecue Area', '❖ Courtesy Patrol', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Pet Friendly', '❖ Porch', '❖ Short Term Lease', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Tennis Court', '❖ Valet Trash', '❖ 2 Community Playgrounds', '❖ 2 Sparkling Pools', '❖ Coffee Concierge', '❖ Controlled Gated Access', '❖ Courtesy Patrol', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Online Services', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Trash Pickup - Door to Door', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 12-Month', 'Pets: $300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AD19BA72B5D340A8']
